stages.name: stage1
stages.message: {ai_role}{ai_goals}What You've Done:{history}Speaking in the first person, state your thought on how to achieve your goals.

stages.name: stage2
stages.message: {ai_role}{ai_goals}Your thought on how to achieve your goals:{stage1.result}Speaking in the first person, briefly state your reasoning for this course of action.

stages.name: stage3
stages.message:
{ai_profile}Your thought on how to achieve your goals:{stage1.result}Your reason:
{stage2.result}Using a bulleted list, state your next 2-4 steps.

stages.name: stage4
stages.message: {ai_role}Your thought on how to achieve your goals:{stage1.result}Next step:{stage3.result.item1}The commands available to you:{commands.names}State the name of the command to use to achieve your next step.
